definition: to close/to stop up/to shut/to obstruct
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Parliamentis prorogue for the summer recess.
Let's appoint a time for the meeting.
I can't go, she'll go instead of me.
sentences.chinese: 我可以替我有病的兄弟去閉會。

sentences.english: There being no further business , I declared the meeting closed.
sentences.chinese: 由於沒有別的事了，我宣佈閉會。

sentences.english: Set time and place of next DA meeting before the meeting ends.
sentences.chinese: 在行動指導會議閉會前確定下次會議的時間和地點。

sentences.english: As there was no further business, I declared the meeting closed.
sentences.chinese: 由於沒有別的事了，我宣佈閉會。

sentences.english: Could you tell me where we will have the meeting this afternoon?
sentences.chinese: 你能通知我我們明天下午將在哪兒閉會嗎？

sentences.english: I'd like to raise a new question before the meeting is over.
sentences.chinese: 會議閉會前我想提出一個新的問題。
